name: react-moment-proptypes

scripts.test-1.6: rm -Rf ./node_modules/moment/ && npm i moment@1.6.0 && npm test
scripts.test-1.7: rm -Rf ./node_modules/moment/ && npm i moment@1.7.0 && npm test
scripts.test-all: npm run test-1.6 && npm run test-1.7 && npm run test-latest
scripts.test-latest: rm -Rf ./node_modules/moment/ && npm i moment@latest && npm test
